The addition below is incorrect. The display can be made correct by changing one digit $d$, wherever it occurs, to another digit $e$. Find the sum of $d$ and $e$.\\
\[\begin{tabular}{ccccccc}& 7 & 4 & 2 & 5 & 8 & 6 \\ + & 8 & 2 & 9 & 4 & 3 & 0\\ \hline 1 & 2 & 1 & 2 & 0 & 1 & 6 \end{tabular}\]$\textbf{(A)}\ 4 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\  6 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 8 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 10 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ \text{More than } 10$
